mapper.insert:
insert into standard_sport_market_odds
id, market_id, odds_fields_templet_id, settlement_result_text, settlement_result, bet_settlement_certainty, odds_type, active, addition1, addition2, addition3, addition4, addition5, `name`, name_expression_value, odds_value, previous_odds_value, third_template_source_id, original_odds_value, target_side, order_odds, data_source_code, third_odds_field_source_id, i18n_names, remark, margin, extra_info, create_time, modify_time, market_diff_value, probability, probability_odds, anchor, margin_probability_odds, name_code, third_source_active, `status`
values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.marketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.oddsFieldsTempletId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.settlementResultText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.settlementResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.betSettlementCertainty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oddsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.active,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.addition1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addition2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addition3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addition4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.addition5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.nameExpressionValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.oddsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.previousOddsValue}, #{item.thirdTemplateSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.originalOddsValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.targetSide,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.orderOdds,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.dataSourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.thirdOddsFieldSourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.i18nNamesStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.margin},#{item.extraInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{item.marketDiffValue},#{item.probability},#{item.probabilityOdds},#{item.anchor},#{item.marginProbabilityOdds},#{item.nameCode}, #{item.thirdSourceActive},#{item.status} )
on duplicate key update
market_id = VALUES(market_id), odds_fields_templet_id = VALUES(odds_fields_templet_id), settlement_result_text = VALUES(settlement_result_text), settlement_result = VALUES(settlement_result), bet_settlement_certainty = VALUES(bet_settlement_certainty), odds_type = VALUES(odds_type), active = VALUES(active), addition1 = VALUES(addition1), addition2 = VALUES(addition2), addition3 = VALUES(addition3), addition4 = VALUES(addition4), addition5 = VALUES(addition5), `name` = VALUES(`name`), name_expression_value = VALUES(name_expression_value), odds_value = VALUES(odds_value), previous_odds_value = VALUES(previous_odds_value), third_template_source_id = VALUES(third_template_source_id), original_odds_value = VALUES(original_odds_value), target_side = VALUES(target_side), order_odds = VALUES(order_odds), data_source_code = VALUES(data_source_code), third_odds_field_source_id = VALUES(third_odds_field_source_id), i18n_names = VALUES(i18n_names), remark = VALUES(remark), margin = IFNULL(VALUES(margin),margin), extra_info = VALUES(extra_info), modify_time = VALUES(modify_time), market_diff_value = values(market_diff_value), probability = values(probability), probability_odds = values(probability_odds), anchor = values(anchor), margin_probability_odds = values(margin_probability_odds), name_code = values(name_code), third_source_active = values(third_source_active), `status` = values(`status`),
